title: Few Fries Short
description: A CMS-style restaurant review website built following the MVC (Model, View, Controller) paradigm. It allows users to create accounts to leave reviews of fast food restaurants. Users can also update, delete reviews, and upload images to the website.

title: Tech Blog
description: A CMS-style blog website built following the MVC (Model, View, Controller) paradigm. It allows users to create an account, create blog posts, edit and delete blog posts, and comment on blog posts.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: An application that allows users to search any city and recieve the weather information for that city. It also provides the UV index of searched city with colours depicting whether they are favourable, moderate or severe.

title: Eat-in 'N Drink-in
description: An application that allows users to search for recipes according to their dietary restrictions. The user can also pair their food search with a drink. Recipes can be favourited and stored for posterity.

title: Work Day Planner
description: An application that allows users to save tasks into a planner. The planner shows the current time, the past, and the future by colour scale. Once tasks are added to the planner, they persist after page refresh.

title: Book Search
description: This Google Books Search app is built in React and allows users to search books via the Google Books API and save them to view later using MongoDB database storage. Once saved, the books can also be deleted from the 'Saved' page.
